CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 33 Random terpolymers comprised of thieno[2′,3′ : 5′,6′]pyrido [ 3,4- g]- thieno[3,2-c]isoquinoline-5,11(4H,10H)-dione , thiophene( T ) , and dithiophene ( 2T ) were synthesized by Yang and co-workers in which the crystallinity of terpolymers could be controlled by varying the compositions of T and 2T.

Let's think step by step.

1. Thieno[2′,3′ : 5′,6′]pyrido [3,4-g]-thieno[3,2-c]isoquinoline-5,11(4H,10H)-dione
2. Thiophene (T)
3. Dithiophene (2T)

These are the "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph. They are the names of the terpolymers or their components.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. Thieno[2′,3′ : 5′,6′]pyrido [3,4-g]-thieno[3,2-c]isoquinoline-5,11(4H,10H)-dione
2. Thiophene (T)
3. Dithiophene (2T)

These are the relevant "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph. I have removed any entities that were not clearly referring to materials.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
